summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.1°C) and outside temperature (down 1.8°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3271 lux) and cloud levels (up 377 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1313 m), light levels (up 5612 lux), feels like temperature (up 3.1°C), and outside temperature (up 2.6°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, a humid atmosphere. Possible light showers, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
